name: Taraf de Haïdouks
description: '''Taraful Haiducilor''' ("Taraf of [[Haiduk]]s") are a Romanian-[[Romani people|Romani]] ''[[taraf (musical band)|taraf]]'' (a troupe of ''[[lăutari]]'', traditional musicians) from [[Clejani]], [[Romania]], and one of the most prominent such groups in [[Romania since 1989|post-Communist era]] Romania. In the Western world they have become known by the name given to them in [[French language|French]]-speaking areas, where they are known as '''Taraf de Haïdouks'''.
